solution.text:
Total cost of ticket = No of kilometres travelled \(\times\) price per km
Price per km = Rs. \(\frac{_{{5*j}}_}{3} \)
Therefore total cost of ticket = \( 1350 \times \frac{_{{5*j}}_}{3} \)
\(\Rightarrow\)Total cost of ticket= Rs. _{{2250*j}}_

content.text: A train ticket costs Rs. _{{5*j}}_  per every 3 Km travelled. Adnan goes from Mumbai to Agra which is at a distance of 1350 Km. how much does his train ticket cost?
